mapper.sql: Id, product_no, name, name_short, price_market, price_site, price_cost, price_min, units, description, status, case when status = 0 then '正常' when status = 1 then '下架' else '' end as status_name, create_date, keywords, pic, type, case when type = 1 then '分类1' when type = 2 then '分类2' when type = 3 then '分类3' when type = 4 then '分类4' else '' end as type_name, big_type, case when big_type = 1 then '大分类1' when big_type = 2 then '大分类2' when big_type = 3 then '大分类3' when big_type = 4 then '大分类4' else '' end as big_type_name, no_order, sales
mapper.insert:
